messages.zh: 后撤！重整队形——让他们走！
messages.en: Fall back! Reform your formations——let them go!

messages.zh: 这些整合运动......不是在针对我们......！
messages.en: These Reunion Movement……they’re not after us……!

messages.zh: 优先保证我方安全！狙击小队——别管整合运动了！优先支援星熊警官！
messages.en: Prioritize our own safety! Sniper squad——never mind Reunion Movement now! Support offcer Hoshiguma!

messages.zh: 不错不错，居然被你撑住了~不过，你还能撑几发呢？
messages.en: Good for you, taking up all of that~ but how many more can you take?

messages.zh: 那你还能再打几发呢——老陈！快！
messages.en: Then how many more can you shoot——Ch’en! Quick!

messages.zh: 油腔滑调不能救你的命。
messages.en: Your jabbering tongue can’t save your life now.

messages.zh: 你对龙门做的，我会加倍在你身上讨回来。
messages.en: What you did to Lungmen, I’ll return to you tenfold.

messages.zh: 但我这次不是来找你的。
messages.en: But I’m not here for you this time.

messages.zh: 是的，有人想和你说点事~
messages.en: Yes, someone wants to have a word with you~

messages.zh: 好，这样我的任务就完成啦。
messages.en: Got it, my job’s finished now.
Be careful of that thing I got.
——Buck up! Don’t sleep! You can’t go to sleep!!

messages.zh: ......优先......处理重伤人员！！给他输血！！快啊！！
messages.en: ……Prioritize……treating the severely wounded!! Give him blood transfusion!! Now!!

messages.zh: ......我们从一开始就被遗弃了！！没有出路的......没有......！
messages.en: ……We’re abandoned since the beginning!! There’s no way out……no way……!

messages.zh: 阿历克赛——阿历克赛！别死！别死！我们说好一起回家的......！
messages.en: Alexis——Alexis! Don’t die! Please don’t die! We promised that we’d go home together……!

messages.zh: 没错，是整合运动——整合运动毁了我的家......
messages.en: Your right, its Reunion Movement——Reunion Movement destroyed my home.

messages.zh: 是我眼睁睁的看着他被拖走，他哭着叫我的名字，我却转过头去——躲进自己的房间......
messages.en: I watched him being dragged away, he was crying my name, but I turned around my head——and hid away into my room……

messages.zh: 他又来找我了......他爱着我，我却害怕了，我逃跑了。
messages.en: He came for me again now……he loves me, but I was afraid, I ran away.

messages.zh: 如今......是我偿还自己罪孽的时候了。
messages.en: And now……it’s time for me to pay me debts.

messages.zh: 这一切，不过是我自己种下的残忍种子所结的恶果......
messages.en: All of this, are but fruits of the seed I planted myself……

messages.zh: 我理应受到这样的折磨。
我就该是感染者，我就该被惩罚——但是，为什么，为什么——
messages.en: I deserved to be infected, I deserved to be punished——but, why, why——

messages.zh: 他明明，什么错也没有啊——？！
messages.en: He didn’t, didn’t do anything wrong——?!

messages.zh: 伤害无辜市民的并不是你！！
messages.en: You’re not the one hurting innocent citizens!!

messages.zh: 可最开始——谁不是无辜的呢？！！
messages.en: But in the beginning——who isn’t innocent?!!

messages.zh: 错的，错的就只有感染者......是谁，导致了这悲剧呢......！为什么感染者就一定要遭遇这些折磨呢！！
messages.en: Why, only the Infected are to be blamed……who is it that led to this tragedy……! Why must the Infected suffer like this!

messages.zh: 我不会放弃......我不会。我已经有了答案......
messages.en: I won’t give up……I won’t. I have my answer now……

messages.zh: 我是一个感染者——我站在感染者这边。你也是......你应该能理解。
messages.en: I am an Infected——and I’m on the side of the Infected. You too……you should be able to understand.

messages.zh: 是的，我也是......罗德岛的很多人也是！！待在你现在的位置，等着我，我立刻来找你！
messages.en: Yes, me too……and that’s the same for many people at Rhodes Island!! Stay where you are now, wait for me, I’ll come for you now!

messages.zh: 他们是感染者......他们也是感染者啊......
